All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AmmoFruit
Fruit which gives the Snake ammo if they collide
Apple
Gives a Snake a point if they collide
ColorChanger
JColorChooser window for changing the Snakes color
Fruit
Stores coordinates, colors of Fruit and has a method for behavior between Snake and Fruit.
GameIOHandler
Handles Saving and Loading of a SnakePanel Object
LeaderBoard
LeaderBoard for storing scores in reverse order
LeaderBoardFrame
Frame for displaying LeaderBoards
LeaderBoardHandler
Handler for loading and saving LeaderBoard using Streams
MapOptionsFrame
Frame for displaying options for the SnakePanel
MapOptionsFrame.MenuKeyAdapter
KeyAdapter for textfield, only numbers can be written
MenuButton
Formatted Button for the MenuFrame
MenuFrame
Main Menu for the game, the user can start new Snake game, load saved progress, open the best scores, open map size options or exit the game
PButton
Button for SidePanel
Projectile
Projectile, which is created when a player invokes the snake.shoot() function Has coordinates and direction
SidePanel
The SidePanel in SnakeFrame, next to SnakePanel, used for starting new game, saving or pausing, or changing Snake color
Snake
Stores coordinates, bodyparts, score, ammo, color and direction of Snake
SnakeFrame
Frame with SidePanel and SnakePanel
SnakeGame
Main Class, which starts a MenuFrame
SnakePanel
The Panel where the Game is displayed, and controlled
StatsPanel
Panel for displaying Score and Ammo of Snake on SnakePanel
ZSnake
Zombie Snake, which can move on its own towards a Snake, has a fixed length
